discussion_comments.comment_body: #nit, I might call this section "Triggers" so in the future we could also but "diagnostics" or something as a watch trigger maybe?
FWIW we do have a rule about this: https://github.com/Kilo-Org/kilocode/blob/6aad037951fde30e4d57bc691092b6bc8e2c4bc5/.kilocode/rules-translate/001-general-rules.md?plain=1#L10
Hum first time I see use of the informal form of address instead of the formal form of address
